trans-unit.resname: PDP14·1 | Bonescythe Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有连击异能。（它们能造成先攻与普通战斗伤害。）

trans-unit.resname: PDP14·2 | Ogre Battledriver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，该生物得+2/+0且获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。（它此回合便能攻击与{T}。）
